name: electron-next-demo
description: Minimal Electron + Next.js setup that documents how the two runtimes interact.

scripts.dev:electron: wait-on tcp:3000 && nodemon --watch main --ext js,json --exec "cross-env NODE_ENV=development ELECTRON_START_URL=http://localhost:3000 electron main/main.js"
scripts.start:electron: wait-on tcp:3000 && cross-env NODE_ENV=production ELECTRON_START_URL=http://localhost:3000 electron main/main.js
